channel.title: Comments on: How To Play Tennis If You’re A Beginner
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: I think one of the most important things in tennis that people neglect is to have a good grip. It can have such a great impact on the performance.
item.content:encoded: I think one of the most important things in tennis that people neglect is to have a good grip. It can have such a great impact on the performance.

item.title: By: Thomas Clarence
item.dc:creator: Thomas Clarence
item.description: My wife and I would like to take tennis lessons together starting next month so that we can have a fun way to relax with each other in the evenings. It was really helpful when you explained that it is a good idea to make sure your eyes stay on the ball when you are serving it. If I were to guess, I would imagine that it would be important to get the right kind of clothes to wear so that you can be comfortable while you are playing tennis.
item.content:encoded: My wife and I would like to take tennis lessons together starting next month so that we can have a fun way to relax with each other in the evenings. It was really helpful when you explained that it is a good idea to make sure your eyes stay on the ball when you are serving it. If I were to guess, I would imagine that it would be important to get the right kind of clothes to wear so that you can be comfortable while you are playing tennis.
